treatment-md.title: Anagyrus amnestos Rameshkumar, Noyes, Poorani & Chong, 2013, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Description of a new species of Anagyrus Howard (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Encyrtidae), a promising biological control agent of the invasive Madeira mealybug, Phenacoccus madeirensis Green (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha: Pseudococcidae)
